column2: `` john hanson thomas sim lee dear sir philadelphia jany 1 st. 1782 congress received intelligence new york gen. leslie wrote sr harry unless sent reinforcement able keep charles town consequence embarkation 1100 men taken place. 1 inclosed packet day. hopes account annapolis paper st eustatius st martins taken french prove true. soon arrival fall received orders mr mollihon money payable different periods promising time appear much due would call payment orders payable 1st month 1st february. mr. mollihon morning account state owes near £500. relying upon orders induced us engage pay money able comply. mr. carroll believe situation. hope excellency honors speedily possible relieve us disagreeable situation. tobacco hitherto sent net £5 hhd. flour good quallity could sent immediately might answer. wish happy new year much esteem regard excellencys humble servt john hanson ``
